title: Jon Snow loves redheads yeah?  :D
body:
‘‘she looks lovely,Jon thought . Lonely and lovely  Ygritte had been pretty in her own way, with her red hair kissed by fire , but it was her smile that made her face come alive. Val did not need to smile; she would have turned men’s heads in any count in the wide world’‘- Jon about Val (ADWTD)

‘’The light of the half-moon turned Vals honey-blond hair a pale silver and left her cheeks as white as snow. She took a deep breath. The air tastes sweet.’‘ _Jon about Val (ADWTD)


‘‘ A warrior princess, he decided, not some willowy creature who sits up in a tower, brushing her hair and waiting for some knight to rescue her ‘‘_ jon snow about Val (ADWD)

“What kind of Queen am I if I’m not willing to risk my life to fight them?’‘_ Daenerys  season 7 episode 4


‘‘she looks lovely,Jon thought . Lonely and lovely ‘’_ Jon about Val

“Off in the distance, a wolf howled. The sound made her feel sad and lonely, but no less hungry. As the moon rose above the grasslands, Dany slipped at last into a restless sleep.“ (ADWD - Dany)

blog.name: alle23212
blog.title: Alle.
blog.description:
librisognierealta.it è il mio blog.
Ho sempre sentito il bisogno di averne uno, ma non avevo mai trovato un argomento che mi spingesse a continuare a scrivere, finché non ho abbracciato la mia natura ossessia-compulsiva e assolutamente pignola! Da questo è nato il mio blog di recensioni e scleri di vario genere: Libri, Sogni e Realtà.

Parliamo della quarta stagione di Game of Thrones e quindi del terzo, quarto e quinto libro de Le cronache del ghiaccio e del fuoco.

blog.name: jadewalker
blog.title: Afterthoughts
blog.description: Jade Walker is a veteran journalist with more than 25+ years of experience covering international and national affairs, crime, the publishing industry, new media and obituaries. Ms. Walker is the overnight editor of The Huffington Post, and the former overnight editor of The New York Times, The Associated Press, Yahoo! News and Night Owl News. In her "spare time," she writes obits for The Blog of Death, produces The Written Word quote service and blogs for the Obituary Forum and Afterthoughts.

Also respected westerosi nobels:

Cersei Lannister: has a bunch of bastard babies murdered because god beware a black haired blue eyed child might be seen

Tywin Lannister: Froced his son to watch his wife have sex with other men

title: GoT foreshadowing
body: Jon watched them leave, and Arya watched Jon. His face had grown as still as the pool at the heart of the godswood. Finally he climbed down off the window. “The show is done,” he said. He bent to scratch Ghost behind the ears. The white wolf rose and rubbed against him. “You had best run back to your room, little sister. Septa Mordane will surely be lurking. The longer you hide, the sterner the penance. You’ll be sewing all through winter. When the spring thaw comes, they will find your body with a needle still locked tight between your frozen fingers.”

reblog.comment: Jon watched them leave, and Arya watched Jon. His face had grown as still as the pool at the heart of the godswood. Finally he climbed down off the window. “The show is done,” he said. He bent to scratch Ghost behind the ears. The white wolf rose and rubbed against him. “You had best run back to your room, little sister. Septa Mordane will surely be lurking. The longer you hide, the sterner the penance. You’ll be sewing all through winter. When the spring thaw comes, they will find your body with a needle still locked tight between your frozen fingers.”

Finally he climbed down off the window. “The show is done,” he said. He bent to scratch Ghost behind the ears. The white wolf rose and rubbed against him. “You had best run back to your room, little sister. Septa Mordane will surely be lurking. The longer you hide, the sterner the penance. You’ll be sewing all through winter. When the spring thaw comes, they will find your body with a needle still locked tight between your frozen fingers.”
trail.content: Jon watched them leave, and Arya watched Jon. His face had grown as still as the pool at the heart of the godswood. Finally he climbed down off the window. “The show is done,” he said. He bent to scratch Ghost behind the ears. The white wolf rose and rubbed against him. “You had best run back to your room, little sister. Septa Mordane will surely be lurking. The longer you hide, the sterner the penance. You’ll be sewing all through winter. When the spring thaw comes, they will find your body with a needle still locked tight between your frozen fingers.”

title: [SPOILERS] Why Arya Sucks Now
body:
Found this video on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yVDrYaXc-EM

Arya was great in the past and I loved her.

But now she’s just this Mary Sue character who does nothing but fan service and is protected by so much plot armour, it’s as if the S7 Arya was taken from a fan fiction.

This video summarizes perfectly why one of the best characters in the show at the beginning is pretty much crap and annoying now.

I know a lot of Arya fans are gonna hate this but it’s the truth in mine and a lot of others’ opinions.

I really hope her character is improved in Season 8.

What do you guys think?

If you disagree with me, feel free to comment why constructively.



Source: http://bit.ly/2RrkBjz

title: [NO SPOILERS] Going to binge..
body:
I have not seen a single GOT episode. I have planned for about the last year or two, to binge all the episodes right before the final season, and then watch the final season live.

​

I figure I can binge all the episodes in one month. A lot of my friends tell me that I should watch through the series two times, (thus requiring more than one month.) My question is, is this true? Will I really need to watch the entire series two times before watching the final season live on Sunday nights? Thank you!



Source: http://bit.ly/2SxjV9x

summary: Catelyn wished she could share his joy. But she had heard the talk in the yards; a direwolf dead in the snow, a broken antler in...
body: Catelyn wished she could share his joy. But she had heard the talk in the yards; a direwolf dead in the snow, a broken antler in its throat. Dread coiled within her like a snake, but she forced herself to smile at this man she loved, this man who put no faith in signs.

reblog.comment: Catelyn wished she could share his joy. But she had heard the talk in the yards; a direwolf dead in the snow, a broken antler in its throat. Dread coiled within her like a snake, but she forced herself to smile at this man she loved, this man who put no faith in signs.

trail.content_raw: Catelyn wished she could share his joy. But she had heard the talk in the yards; a direwolf dead in the snow, a broken antler in its throat. Dread coiled within her like a snake, but she forced herself to smile at this man she loved, this man who put no faith in signs.
trail.content: Catelyn wished she could share his joy. But she had heard the talk in the yards; a direwolf dead in the snow, a broken antler in its throat. Dread coiled within her like a snake, but she forced herself to smile at this man she loved, this man who put no faith in signs.
